_header: My head did ache yester night
_description: ‘On his heid-ake’ by William Dunbar — three 5-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
My heid did ȝak ȝester nichtThis day to mak þat I na
                    micht…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…ffor din nor danceing nor derayIt will not walkin me no
                    wise
